description.short: Chat with an AI assistant for HR, IT, and workplace requests—right in Teams.
description.full: Get the help you need—fast. This AI-powered self-service assistant lives inside Microsoft Teams and is ready 24/7 to answer questions, guide you through HR and IT processes, and help you get work done without switching apps. Ask it about benefits, payroll, or company policies. Request time off or parental leave. Order equipment, get tech support, or check the status of a help desk ticket—all through a simple chat. No forms to hunt down, no complicated portals to navigate. Behind the scenes, the assistant connects securely to your organizations knowledge sources and business systems, such as SharePoint, Microsoft Graph, Workday, ServiceNow, or SAP. It uses natural language understanding to deliver accurate, relevant answers and trigger workflows automatically. Works in Microsoft 365 CoPilot.
